column4: Hi people i ve a Dell Inspiron 1520 Laptop and i ve installed 7.10 in it . Now i tried configuring Wireless In Ubuntu. I ve a NetGear Wireless Router Installed .I ve password Enabled in it to avoid other people using it but what happens is that i am not able to connect to the wireless network though Ubuntu recognizes the router . I am able to do the same using Ubuntu to an other Network which does not have password enabled . can someone help me please ?
I am desparately in need of the connection
I ve given the password type as WEP
linux___alien: well, it isn't a driver issue, try switchign to WPA on the router (more secure) and see if that works
In Ubuntu i gave the WEP key the 13 Digit Key as input. Thats right?
I tried both the Ascii option and the hexadecimal option too
I should give the key only right and not the PassPhrase right/
WEP is key based, shoud be 12 hex digit pairs
sorry 13 i'll get it right one day
Ok So is there any other way that i could resolve it ?
Try removing security from your router, just for the moment
